title: A discourse concerning the gift of prayer shewing what it is, wherein it consists, and how far it is attainable by industry, with divers useful and proper directions to that purpose, both in respect of matter, method, and expression / by John Wilkins, D.D. ; whereunto may be added Ecclesiastes, or, A discourse concerning the gift of preaching by the same authour.
author: Wilkins, John, 1614-1672.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Samuel Gellibrand ...,
